select EA_NUMBER, doc_name, EA_TITLE , mem_name , EA_WRITEDATE , EA_STARTDATE , EA_ENDDATE from ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL,approval_line,approval_step,document,member where al_number = AST_AL_NUMBER and ea_number = AST_EA_NUMBER and doc_number = EA_DOC_NUMBER and mem_number = EA_MEM_number and al_number='C' and AST_MEM_NUMBER=#{ea_mem_number}
and ea_title like '%'||#{ea_title}||'%'
and ea_number like '%'||#{ea_number}||'%'
and doc_name like '%'||#{doc_name}||'%'
order by to_number(substr(EA_NUMBER,INSTR (EA_NUMBER, '-') +6)) desc
